name: TCS Ion
description: TCS iON is focused on empowering people and organizations with tech-led education to transform themselves for the new world. It uses uniquely built ‘Phygital’ platforms that overlay digital technologies over physical assets. For recruitment boards, corporate entities, and education institutions, TCS iON offers a range of interventions that reimagine and transform all the key processes. For individual learners, it offers a plethora of multi-modal learning courses imparting a varied range of skills and proficiencies. With all this, TCS iON serves every stakeholder in the education domain: school students, schools, education boards, youth, colleges, universities, skilling institutes, working professionals, corporate entities and recruiting organizations.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: We would like to know you better
ShortDescription: TCS iON is a strategic business unit of Tata Consultancy Services (TCS). TCS iON, a unit of Tata Consultancy Services, is focussed on empowering people and organisations with tech-led solutions to transform educational and skill development domains for the new world. We use a uniquely built ‘phygital’ platform that connects the digital and physical worlds.

Highlights.name: Digital Learning
Highlights.description: Transform learning at your institution with the TCS iON Digital Learning Platform. Our community-driven approach, powered by a state-of-the-art LMS, provides a perfect environment for an improved outcome. From course delivery, assessments to evaluations and beyond, we are here to help you achieve your goals and your full potential

Highlights.name: Digital Assessments
Highlights.description: Assessments play a crucial role at every step of a student's academic journey. However, ensuring assessments are transparent, efficient and fair, requires significant planning, effort, and resources from the institution. TCS iON Digital Assessments Solution - The ultimate solution to seamlessly conduct exams online and offline

Highlights.name: Digital Marking
Highlights.description: Transform your institution's evaluation process with the TCS iON Digital Marking (iDM) solution. Our simple yet effective solution takes care of all manual tasks such as totaling, validation of maximum marks awarded, ensuring all answers are marked and handling optional sections/questions.

enhanced_description: TCS iON, a strategic business unit of Tata Consultancy Services, is dedicated to empowering individuals and organizations through tech-led education and skill development solutions. It leverages uniquely built 'Phygital' platforms, overlaying digital technologies over physical assets, to transform key processes for recruitment boards, corporate entities, and educational institutions. The platform offers a comprehensive range of interventions, including a state-of-the-art Learning Management System (LMS) for digital learning, supporting community-driven course delivery, assessments, and evaluations. Its Digital Assessments solution enables seamless conduct of exams both online and offline, emphasizing transparency, efficiency, and fairness. Additionally, the Digital Marking (iDM) solution automates manual evaluation tasks such as totaling, validation, and handling optional questions, thereby transforming the evaluation process for institutions. TCS iON serves a broad spectrum of stakeholders, from school students, colleges, and universities to working professionals and recruiting organizations, offering multi-modal learning courses to impart diverse skills and proficiencies.
competitive_advantages: Unique 'Phygital' platform approach combining digital and physical assets
Transparent, efficient, and fair digital assessment capabilities
Automation of manual evaluation and marking tasks
primary_users: Educational Institutions (Schools, Colleges, Universities, Skilling Institutes)
